generatedSteps.title: Verify SSO and Ping
generatedSteps.description: Confirm your security credentials are working properly. Test SSO login, PingID multi-factor authentication, and YubiKey hardware authentication.

generatedSteps.title: Request Local Admin Access
generatedSteps.description: Submit ticket for local administrator rights on your machine. Required for installing development tools and dependencies.

generatedSteps.title: Install VS Code
generatedSteps.description: Download and install Visual Studio Code from code.visualstudio.com. Configure user settings and workspace preferences.

generatedSteps.title: Setup GitHub Personal Account
generatedSteps.description: Create or verify your GitHub personal account. Configure 2FA and SSH keys for secure authentication.

generatedSteps.title: Setup GitHub Copilot
generatedSteps.description: Install GitHub Copilot extension in your IDE. Sign in with your GitHub account and verify Copilot is active.
